overview: Colin has over a decade of experience integrating sales, marketing, and engineering to bring innovative products to market. At Akamai Technologies he led teams to accelerate the sales process for new products and held roles in direct and technical sales. Prior to that Colin oversaw product development for travel.500ppm.com, the first retail carbon offset website for vacation travelers, and managed technical infrastructure for the first electronic carbon exchange, CO2e.com, while at Cantor-Fitzgerald. He was an enterprise consultant at Trilogy Software and a developer for electronic warfare projects at the U.S. DoD. Colin has a BSE in Computer Science from the University of Pennsylvania.
